MAIN_SUBTITLE: Delivery is good. Homemade food, much better.
HOW_IT_WORKS_BODY: It's very easy, just 4 simple steps!
SEARCH_BY_ADDRESS_BODY: Find all the chefs in your area.
CHOOSE_YOUR_COOKER_BODY: We have more than 200 available menus.
PAY_WITH_BODY: It's fast, easy and completly safe.
LAZY_BODY: Are you just getting home? Don't want to leave home out?
ESTIMATED_TIME: Estimated delivery time for your order!
CHOOSE_MOST_POPULAR_SUBTITLE: The highest rated plates of OsoGloton.
404_NOT_FOUND_BODY: The page you were looking does not exist or isn't available at the moment. Plese try another page...
CHOOSE_FROM_COOKERS_SUBTITLE: Delicious hommade food, one click away!
OFFICE_DELIVERY: We can also deliver to your office
OFFICE_DELIVERY_BODY: Did you forget your lunch? Don't worry, we'll bring it to you!
WANT_TO_BE_CHEF_BODY: Register, complete your info and get cooking!
NEWSLETTER_BODY: Subscribe to our newsletter and keep track of our offers and news.
NO_ADDRESS_OPTION_1: Check that it's correctly written (ex. 18 de Julio 1234)
NO_ADDRESS_OPTION_2: Try to enter an address nearby (ex. 18 de Julio 1234)
NO_ADDRESS_OPTION_3: Press the location button to upload your current location
NEW_CHEF_TITLE: Do you like to cook? and want to make some extra money?
NEW_CHEF_BODY: Register for free, come meet us and put your talents to use!
MORE_QUESTIONS: Contact us if you have any more questions
LOGIN_ERROR: Sorry, we couldn't enter your account
NEW_USER_TITLE: Are you sick of delivery and want to eat healthy?
NEW_USER_BODY: Register for free and discover homemade options near you!
HISTORY_SUBTITLE: Check your active orders and the ones already completed
CANT_ENTER: Section only available for registered users
NO_PLATES_NEARBY: We haven't found plates near your zone
ERROR_GENERIC: An error has ocurred, try again
NO_REVIEWS: No comments about this plate yet. Be the first to try it!
NO_REVIEWS_CHEF: No comments about this cook yet. Be the first to order!
FIELDS_REQUIRED_AND_ERRORS: Please complete the required fields and verify it's accuracy.
FORGOT_TEXT: An email will be sent to your email to reset your password
FACE_NO_EMAIL: We couldn't obtain your email from facebook. Please, enter it.
GOOGLE_NO_EMAIL: We couldn't get your email from Google. Please, enter it.
ERROR_LOGIN: Something went wrong. Please sign in again.
ERROR_SIGNUP: An error ocurred creating your account. Please try again.
FORGOT_SUCCESS: We have sent you an email to reset your password. Please check your inbox.
EMPTY_CART_DESCRIPTION: The cart is empty, you can view and add items in the food section.
PLATES_NEARBY: All these plates are near you
PAYMENT_SUCCESS: The payment was successful and your plate is being prepared. Thank you for your purchase. See you next time.
QUESTION_DETAIL_TEXT: The quesion will be private between you and the cook.
QUESTION_SEND: Your question has been successfully sent. The cook will contact you briefly.
EMPTY_PRODUCTS_DESCRIPTION: At this time we can't find any products to offer you. Please try later.
REPORT_TEXT: Enter your comments on this plate
SEND_PICTURE_BODY: Do you wish to add an image to your report?
RATE_TEXT: Your commment will be sent directly to the cook
RATE_DESCRIPTION_INIT: Review your experience with this plate
RATE_DONE: Your reviews were successfully sent. Thank you for sharing your experiences with us!
NO_SELECT_TIME: You have to select at least one planification
DELIVERY_TIMES_BODY: Generally delivery times depends on the plate and the distance to the cook. If your order takes longer than estimated please contact us.
SECURE_PAYMENT_BODY: If you don't want to pay online, no problem. You can always pay the delivery.
ORDER_ACTIONS_DONE: Your answers have been successfully sent
NAME: Name
NO_ADDRESS: You don't have registered addresses. Please enter your first address.
REMOVE_ADDRESS_BODY: Are you sure you want to delete adress? Having one is required to use the app.
NAME_ERROR: You can't use the same name for an already registered address.
ERROR_USER_UPD: Your information can't be updated at this time. Please try again later.
OK_USER_UPD: Your information has been successfully updated!
ERROR_NO_ADRESS: You need to register at least one address to confirm your order. Do you wish to create one?
ERROR_NO_ADRESS_SELECTED: You need to register at least one address to confirm your order.
ONE_DIRECTION: You have already registered your address
GO_BUY: You haven't placed an order yet. Place first order with Oso Glotón!
GO_COOK: You haven't sold anything yet. Wait for a buyer to order something
GO_ASK: No questions have been asked at the moment. Questions to sellers will be displayed here.
MESSAGE_NOT_SEND: Your message could not be sent. Please try again.
QUESTIONS_SUBTITLE: Conversations with chefs about your questions
QUESTIONS_CHEF_SUBTITLE: Conversations with customers about their questions
TITLE_CURRENT_PLATES_BODY: Here will be displayed active orders from your customers
EMPTY_CURRENT_PLATES_DESCRIPTION: You don't have active plates. Customer orders will be displayed here!
DATES_CHANGED: Your proposal has been sent to the customer
TITLE_MY_PLATES_BODY: Here will be displayed plates that will be offered to customers
EMPTY_MY_PLATES_DESCRIPTION: You have no created plates, to create a plate, touch the '+' button in the upper right side
NO_PICTURES: You don't have any pictures. Add your first picture!
CONFIRM_ADD_PICTURE_DESCRIPTION: Remember that to add a new picture, said picture must be take by the process of photography. Do you wish to request to add a new picture?
CONFIRM_ADD_PICTURE_SUCCESS: Request sent, You will be contacted shortly to coordinate photography.
CONFIRM_DELETE_PICTURE_DESCRIPTION: Once deleted, picture can't be recovered. Do you wish to continue?
CONFIRM_CANCEL_PICTURE_REPLACE_DESCRIPTI: Do you wish to cancel picture verification request? Previous verified picture will be enabled.
CONFIRM_CANCEL_PICTURE_NEW_DESCRIPTION: Do you wish to cancel picture verification request?
CONFIRM_REPLACE_PICTURE_DESCRIPTION: The curren picture will be enabled until the new picture is verified. After verification, the current picture will be replaced with the new one ¿Continue?
SUCCESS_REPLACE_PICTURE: Picture uploaded successfully and in verification process.
TOOLTIP_NEW_PICTURE: The new picture is in verification process. After being verified it will be visible to users.
TOOLTIP_REPLACING_PICTURE: The new picture is in verification process. After being verified, the current picture will be deleted and the new one will be visible to users.
TOOLTIP_VERIFIED_PICTURE: The picture is verified and visible to users.
ERROR_ACTIVATION_NO_PICTURE: In order to activate the plate you need at least 1 verified picture.
ERROR_DELETE_ONLY_ONE_PICTURE: You can't have less than one verified picture. If you wish to change it you can select the option to replace it.
WELCOME_NOTIFICATION: Stay tuned in! We'll notify any new orders, messages and others.
SAME_PASSWORD: Check that you confirm correctly your new password
VALIDATE_SUCESS_REDIRECT: Account validated, you will be redirected in a few seconds...
ALLIED_CONTACT_US: For billing questions please call Allied Wallet at +1-888-255-1137 or
